---
title: "Fluffy_Bird"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```


```{r}
# Read the Excel file
Fluffy_data <- read_excel("F_data.xlsx")
```



```{r}
ggplot(Fluffy_data, aes(x = Fluffiness, y = Temp_Area)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", aes(fill = Fluffiness), color = "black") +
  labs(
    title = "Bird Fluffiness compared to temp",
    x = "Fluffiness Level",
    y = "Temperature in captured area"
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    axis.text.x = element_text(size = 12, face = "bold"),
    axis.text.y = element_text(size = 12, face = "bold"),
    axis.title.x = element_text(size = 14, face = "bold"),
    axis.title.y = element_text(size = 14, face = "bold"),
    plot.title = element_text(size = 16, face = "bold"),
    legend.position = "none"
  )
```


```{r}

ggplot(Fluffy_data, aes(x = Fluffiness, y = Temp_Area)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5) +  # Use transparency for better visual overlap handling
  facet_grid(. ~ Fluffiness, scales = "free_x") +  # Facet by Fluffiness to compare per category
  labs(
    title = "Bird Fluffiness Compared to Area Temperature",
    y = "Temperature in Captured Area",
    x = "Fluffiness Level"
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    axis.text.x = element_text(size = 12, face = "bold"),
    axis.text.y = element_text(size = 12, face = "bold"),
    axis.title.x = element_text(size = 14, face = "bold"),
    axis.title.y = element_text(size = 14, face = "bold"),
    plot.title = element_text(size = 16, face = "bold"),
    strip.text = element_text(size = 12)
  )

```



```{r}

ggplot(Fluffy_data, aes(x = Fluffiness, y = Temp_Area)) +
  geom_jitter(aes(color = Fluffiness), width = 0.2, height = 0, alpha = 0.5) +  # Jitter the points horizontally
  facet_grid(. ~ Fluffiness, scales = "free_x") +  # Facet by Fluffiness to compare per category
  labs(
```

```{r}

# Correctly convert Fluffiness to a factor with the desired order
Fluffy_data$Fluffiness <- factor(Fluffy_data$Fluffiness, 
                                  levels = c("Naked", "Light Fluff", "Medium Fluff", "Fluffy", "Cloud Fluffy", "Only Fluff"))

ggplot(Fluffy_data, aes(x = Fluffiness, y = Temp_Area)) +
  geom_jitter(aes(color = Fluffiness), width = 0.2, height = 0, alpha = 0.5) +
  facet_grid(. ~ Fluffiness, scales = "free_x") +
  labs(
    title = "Bird Fluffiness Compared to Area Temperature",
    y = "Temperature in Captured Area",
    x = "Fluffiness Level"
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    axis.text.x = element_text(size = 12, face = "bold"),
    axis.text.y = element_text(size = 12, face = "bold"),
    axis.title.x = element_text(size = 14, face = "bold"),
    axis.title.y = element_text(size = 14, face = "bold"),
    plot.title = element_text(size = 16, face = "bold"),
    strip.text = element_text(size = 12)
  )

```
